scripts.lint: npm run lint-ts && npm run lint-md
scripts.deploy: gh-pages -d dist -m "Built from $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) on master" ; npm run cleanup
scripts.setup: rm -rf .git && > README.md && git init && npm install

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run pretty
hooks.post-commit: git push -u origin master && if git-branch-is master ; then npm run build && npm run deploy ; fi
